DataElement.preferredDefinition: Score to represent a structured reporting scheme for multiparametric prostate cancer imaging using multiple MRI techniques including T2 weighted images, a dynamic contrast-enhanced study (DCE), diffusion weighted imaging (DWI), and possibly spectroscopy (MRS) with a modification of contrast-enhanced MRI that allows observation of functional properties in addition to structural properties.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A structured reporting scheme for multiparametric prostate cancer imaging and diagnosis. Prostate images are obtained using multiple MRI techniques including T2 weighted images, a dynamic contrast-enhanced study (DCE), diffusion weighted imaging (DWI), and possibly spectroscopy (MRS). Each lesion receives a score from 1 to 5 for each individual imaging parameter, as well as an overall 1-5 grading score reflecting the likelihood of clinically significant cancer, with 1 being most probably benign and 5 being highly suspicious of malignancy._A modification of contrast-enhanced MRI that allows observation of functional properties in addition to structural properties._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ValueDomain.preferredName: PI-RADS Dynamic Contrast-enhanced Magnetic Resonance Imaging Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A structured reporting scheme for multiparametric prostate cancer imaging and diagnosis. Prostate images are obtained using multiple MRI techniques including T2 weighted images, a dynamic contrast-enhanced study (DCE), diffusion weighted imaging (DWI), and possibly spectroscopy (MRS). Each lesion receives a score from 1 to 5 for each individual imaging parameter, as well as an overall 1-5 grading score reflecting the likelihood of clinically significant cancer, with 1 being most probably benign and 5 being highly suspicious of malignancy._A modification of contrast-enhanced MRI that allows observation of functional properties in addition to structural properties._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Type 3 represents rapid enhancement followed by a rapid wash out of the contrast material.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Focal enhancing lesion with curve type 2-3.
